articleinfo.releaseinfo: ਇਸ ਦਸਤਾਵੇਜ਼ ਵਿੱਚ ਘੜੀ ਐਪਲਿਟ ਦਸਤਾਵੇਜ਼ V2.5.3.1 ਬਾਰੇ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ ਹੈ।

legalnotice.title: ਸੁਝਾਅ
legalnotice.para: To report a bug or make a suggestion regarding the Clock applet or this manual, follow the directions in the GNOME Feedback Page.

abstract.para: The Clock applet displays the date and time, and when clicked, displays a calendar. The Clock can be customized to show seconds or a 12 or 24 hour clock.

sect1.title: ਜਾਣ ਪਛਾਣ
sect1.para: The Clock applet displays the date and time, and when clicked, displays a calendar. The Clock can be customized to show seconds or a 12 or 24 hour clock.

listitem.para: Right-click on the panel.
Choose Add to Panel.
Scroll down the list of items in the Add to Panel dialog, then select Clock.
Click Add.

sect2.title: To Show the Calendar
sect2.para: Click on the applet to open a small calendar showing the current month. To close the calendar, click again on the part of the applet that is in the panel.
You can change the month shown in the calendar by clicking the arrows to each side of the month and year text.
Double-click a day in the calendar to launch the Evolution groupware application.

sect2.title: ਇੱਕ ਕਾਰਜ ਵਿੱਚ ਮਿਤੀ ਜਾਂ ਸਮਾਂ ਜੋੜੋ
sect2.para: The Clock applet takes the time from the system clock.
To insert the date or time from the Clock applet into an application, perform the following steps:

listitem.para: ਘੜੀ ਐਪਲਿਟ ਉੱਤੇ ਸੱਜਾ ਬਟਨ ਦਬਾਓ
ਐਪਲਿਟ ਪੋਪਅੱਪ ਮੇਨੂ ਤੋਂ ਹੇਠ ਦਿੱਤੀਆਂ ਇਕਾਈਆਂ ਵਿੱਚੋਂ ਇੱਕ ਚੁਣੋ:
ਤੁਹਾਡੇ ਕਾਰਜ ਵਿੱਚ ਟਿਕਾਣਾ, ਜਿੱਥੇ ਤੁਸੀਂ ਇਕਾਈ ਨੂੰ ਚੇਪਣਾ ਚਾਹੁੰਦੇ ਹੋ।
Choose EditPaste or middle-click to insert the item.

sect2.title: ਸਿਸਟਮ ਸਮਾਂ ਜਾਂ ਮਿਤੀ ਠੀਕ ਕਰਨੀ
sect2.para: To adjust the system date or time that the Clock applet displays, perform the following steps:

listitem.para: Right-click on the applet, then choose Adjust Date & Time.
Type the root password, then click OK.
The Clock applet starts the system tool that sets the system date and time. Use the tool to adjust the date and time.

sect1.title: Clock Preferences
sect1.para: To configure the Clock, right-click on the applet, then choose Preferences. You will be presented with three tabs to change preferences for General, Locations or Weather.

listitem.para: ਹੇਠ ਦਿੱਤੀਆਂ ਚੋਣਾਂ ਵਿੱਚੋਂ ਚੋਣ ਕਰੋ:
ਸਮੇਂ ਨੂੰ ਸਵੇਰੇ/ਸ਼ਾਮ ਫਾਰਮਿਟ ਵਿੱਚ ਵਿਖਾਇਆ ਜਾਦਾ ਹੈ।

note.para: This option is not shown if your session language does not use the 12 hour clock.

listitem.para: Select this option to display the date in the applet.
Select this option to display seconds in the applet.
Select this option to display the the current weather forecast at your location. The weather will be displayed as an icon for sunny, cloudy, rain or more.
Select this option to display the temperature at your location.
You can add one or more locations and their local time to be displayed in the Clock. To add a location:
Press Add

Type the city, region or country name and as you type a list of options will appear in a drop down box. Select a match from the pop-up and the Timezone, Latitude, and Longitude entries will be automatically filled in.
You can display the Temperature unit in one of the following options from the drop down box:
F (Fahrenheit)
C (Celsius)
K (Kelvin)
Default The default display for your region.
You can display the Speed unit in one of the following options from the drop down box:
mph (miles per hour)
km/h (kilometers per hour)
Dm/a (meters per second)
Default The default display for your region.
